title: Coronation Street fans furious as innocent David is charged with attempted murder

Coronation Street fans were furious tonight after discovering that an innocent David Platt was charged with attempted murder.

Rapist Josh Tucker was stabbed in prison and left in a coma after a riot.

David was given the chance to kill him by the other prison inmates, but instead tried to save his life.

However this put David in the frame for his attempted murder and Shona confirmed that he had been charged.

One devastated fan tweeted: "Omg, David charged with attempted murder, please get him free! #Corrie."

While another commented: "OMG David #corrie @itvcorrie."

A third wrote: "Aw David :( Please get him out of prison and fast!! #Corrie."

"Obviously motive overtakes evidence in David’s case #Corrie," another remarked.

One pleaded: "Nick you have to help David #corrie @itvcorrie."

Another remarked: "Obviously motive overtakes evidence in David’s case #Corrie."

A fan wrote: "But David didn’t do it #Corrie."

*Coronation Street returns tomorrow at 8pm on ITV
description: Rapist Josh Tucker was stabbed during a prison riot and left in a coma on Coronation Street
